android.car

类 VehicleAreaDoor

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.VehicleAreaDoor

  • public final class VehicleAreaDoor
extends java.lang.Object
    VehicleAreaDoor is an abstraction for a door in a car. Some car APIs may provide control per door and values defined here should be used to distinguish different doors.
